north_comment: If the agent moves north from current position, it will get eaten by the wumpus.
east_comment: It's possible that there is a pit in the east, but we're not sure.
south_comment: The south is (1,1) and it's trivially safe since the agent was just there one step before.
west_comment: Moving west is invalid because we cannot step outside the board.
rows_comment: The number of rows of the map
columns_comment: The number of columns of the map
wumpuses_comment: The number of wumpuses in the map
pits_comment: The number of pits in the map
observations_comment: The sequence of observations gathered by the actions the agent has done so far

observations.location_comments: Coordinates where the observation was made
observations.percepts_comments: The list of percepts gathered by the agent, empty list mean nothing was perceived.

observations.location_comments: This is the current position of the agent.
